amendment.description: Amendment makes modifications to the administration of laws pertaining to the wetlands permitting program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to modify the bill's provisions relating to the new national permit rules for wetlands by reducing the number of reports required to be submitted to Congress; striking provisions making 1999 the base year for productivity comparisons; and by expanding the one-year pilot program to include and additional region.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boehlert amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
